name: LoopOver:The Assassination
description:
The browser version may/may not display some frames depending on the browser you are using. For a smooth game-play feel free to get the windows version of the game!!! Use of "X" , "Z" and arrow keys for controls!!! 

Control's stuck? Try using the cursor to click the game window area and try using controls again.

Did you like this game?? Try this game too!!

NekoTale:The Prologue: https://hearts-in-two.itch.io/nekotale

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/heartsintwo/
